trans-unit.source: Provides a basic implementation of a custom peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 提供自訂對等解析程式服務的基本實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService> class defines the base implementation of a custom peer resolver service and provides lookup for the resolution of registration IDs to peer endpoint addresses within the mesh maintained by this resolver.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService> 類別定義自訂對等解析程式服務的基本實作，並且提供查詢解析的能力，可以將註冊 ID 解析成此解析程式所維護之網狀結構內的對等端點位址。

trans-unit.source: Implementers of custom peer resolvers should derive from this class and override those specific functions for which they are providing custom implementations.
trans-unit.target: 自訂對等解析程式的實作器應該衍生自此類別，並且覆寫這些實作器針對其提供自訂實作的特定函式。

trans-unit.source: Any custom peer resolver must minimally implement the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.IPeerResolverContract" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 任何自訂對等解析程式都至少必須實作 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.IPeerResolverContract" /> 介面

trans-unit.source: Also, clients using a custom resolver must have some upper bound on client-server latency in order to successfully refresh their registration with the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用自訂解析程式的用戶端必須設定用戶端伺服器延遲時間的上限，才能順利重新整理用戶端向對等解析程式服務的註冊狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService" /> 類別預設的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the recurring length of time after which stale entries are deleted from the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定週期性時間長度。經過這段時間之後，過時的項目會從對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表刪除。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies the time interval after which stale entries are deleted from the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: 指定時間間隔的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。經過這段時間之後，過時的項目會從對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表刪除。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before the peer resolver service has been and must not be zero.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性必須在對等解析程式服務之前設定，而且不能為零。

trans-unit.source: The default interval is 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 預設間隔為 1 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: This value must be less than the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.RefreshInterval%2A> to avoid the occurrence of stale entries in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: 這個值必須小於 <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.RefreshInterval%2A> 的值，以避免對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中出現過時項目。

trans-unit.source: The interval is either zero or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 間隔為零或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property was made after a call to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 已在呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" /> 之後嘗試設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Closes the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 關閉對等解析程式服務。

trans-unit.source: The service has been closed by a previous call to this method.
trans-unit.target: 服務已透過前一次呼叫此方法來關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether referrals are shared by the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對等解析程式服務是否共用轉介。

trans-unit.source: True if referrals are shared by the peer resolver service; false if they are not.
trans-unit.target: 如果對等解析程式服務共用轉介則為 true，否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the specific response settings for the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 取得對等解析程式服務的特定回應設定。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ServiceSettingsResponseInfo" /> that contains the specific response settings for the custom peer resolver service, including cleanup and refresh interval settings.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ServiceSettingsResponseInfo" />，其中包含自訂對等解析程式服務的特定回應設定，包括清除間隔和重新整理間隔設定。

trans-unit.source: Opens the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 開啟對等解析程式服務。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, it schedules the first registration lookup table cleanup based on the value set for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.CleanupInterval%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，會根據 <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.CleanupInterval%2A> 屬性的設定值，排定第一次的註冊查閱資料表清除作業。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.CleanupInterval" /> or <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.RefreshInterval" /> are set to a time span interval of 0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.CleanupInterval" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.RefreshInterval" /> 設定的時間間隔為 0。

trans-unit.source: The service has been started by a previous call to this method.
trans-unit.target: 服務已透過前一次呼叫此方法來啟動。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshInfo" /> object that contains the mesh ID and the registration ID of the entry to refresh in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshInfo" /> 物件，其中包含項目的網狀結構 ID 和註冊 ID，可在對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中重新整理。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the expiry of an entry in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中某項目的過期狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshResponseInfo" /> that contains the newly refreshed registration entry.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshResponseInfo" />，其中包含重新整理後的註冊項目。

trans-unit.source: A refresh of an entry extends the length of time for which it remains valid.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理項目可延長該項目保持有效的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: All information used to uniquely identify the entry must be supplied in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshInfo> object supplied to this method.
trans-unit.target: 在提供給此方法的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshInfo> 物件中，必須提供用來唯一識別項目的所有資訊。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="refreshInfo" /> is set to null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="refreshInfo" /> 設定為 null。

trans-unit.source: The custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 自訂對等解析程式服務尚未透過前一次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" /> 來啟動。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of time that entries remain valid in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定時間長度，對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中的項目會在這段時間內保持有效。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies the length of time that entries remain valid in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: 指定時間長度的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中的項目會在這段時間內保持有效。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before the peer resolver service has been and must not be zero.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性必須在對等解析程式服務之前設定，而且不能為零。

trans-unit.source: The default interval is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 預設間隔為 2 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: When the amount of time supplied to this property has passed for a given entry in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table, that entry is marked for deletion.
trans-unit.target: 對等解析程式服務之註冊查閱資料表中的指定項目，在經過提供給此屬性的時間長度後，會標記為要刪除。

trans-unit.source: The delete occurs when interval specified in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.CleanupInterval%2A> property occurs.
trans-unit.target: 到達 <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.CleanupInterval%2A> 屬性中指定的間隔時，便會進行刪除。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to a timespan of 10 minutes, entries in the registration lookup table will become stale and marked for deletion after the interval has passed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果這個屬性設定為 10 分鐘，註冊查閱資料表中的項目就會在經過這段間隔後變成過時狀態，並且標記為要刪除。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the peer resolver client must update every ten minutes to avoid having their entry deleted.
trans-unit.target: 因此，對等解析程式用戶端必須每隔十分鐘更新一次，以避免其項目遭到刪除。

trans-unit.source: The interval is either zero or greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 間隔為零或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property was made after a call to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 已在呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" /> 之後嘗試設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Registers a peer with the custom peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 向自訂對等解析程式服務註冊對等。

trans-unit.source: To register a peer node in a specific mesh, a correctly-formed <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo> object must be supplied to one of the overloads for this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊特定網狀結構中的對等節點，必須將格式正確的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo> 物件提供給此方法的其中一個多載。

trans-unit.source: This object contains the specific details necessary to register the registration entry requesting registration, including a GUID that uniquely identifies the registration entry, the mesh ID, and an endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件包含註冊要求註冊之註冊項目所需的特定詳細資訊，包括可唯一識別註冊項目的 GUID、網狀結構 ID 和端點位址。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo" /> that contains information about the registration entry to register with the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo" />，其中包含要向對等解析程式服務註冊之註冊項目的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 將新的項目加入至對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo" /> that contains a copy of the entry added to the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo" />，其中包含加入至對等解析程式服務之註冊查閱資料表的項目複本。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將新的項目加入至對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表。

trans-unit.source: Note that registrations made after the service is closed have no effect -- these entries are not returned by resolve requests.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在服務關閉後進行的註冊都無效，解析要求不會傳回這些項目。

trans-unit.source: A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同 GUID 的註冊項目已經存在查閱資料表中，或是自訂對等解析程式服務尚未透過前一次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" /> 來啟動。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo" /> object supplied to this method was either null or not correctly formed.
trans-unit.target: 提供給此方法的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo" /> 物件為 null 或格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: The AddressInfo property of the object supplied to the <paramref name="registerInfo" /> parameter was null.
trans-unit.target: 提供給 <paramref name="registerInfo" /> 參數之物件的 AddressInfo 屬性為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="meshId" /> value supplied to this method is set to null.
trans-unit.target: 提供給此方法的 <paramref name="meshId" /> 值設定為 null。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that specifies a unique identifier for the registration entry to register with the resolver service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，可指定要向解析程式服務註冊之註冊項目的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the mesh ID of the peer mesh in which the registration entry participates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，可指定註冊項目所參與之對等網狀結構的網狀結構 ID。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress" /> that contains the endpoint address of the registration entry.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress" />，其中包含註冊項目的端點位址。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 將新的項目加入至對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo" /> that contains a copy of the entry added to the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo" />，其中包含加入至對等解析程式服務之註冊查閱資料表的項目複本。

trans-unit.source: A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同 GUID 的註冊項目已經存在查閱資料表中，或是自訂對等解析程式服務尚未透過前一次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" /> 來啟動。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo" /> object supplied to this method was either null or not correctly formed.
trans-unit.target: 提供給此方法的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo" /> 物件為 null 或格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: The MeshId and/or the RegistrationId property of object supplied to the <paramref name="refreshInfo" /> parameter was null.
trans-unit.target: 提供給 <paramref name="refreshInfo" /> 參數之物件的 MeshId 屬性和 (或) RegistrationId 屬性為 null。

trans-unit.source: The MeshId property of the object supplied to the <paramref name="refreshInfo" /> parameter is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 提供給 <paramref name="refreshInfo" /> 參數之物件的 MeshId 屬性未知。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo" /> that contains information on the registration entry for which endpoints, if known, are to be looked up by the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo" />，其中包含註冊項目的相關資訊，對等解析程式服務將查詢該項目的已知端點。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of known endpoints for a registration entry.
trans-unit.target: 傳回註冊項目已知端點的清單。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveResponseInfo" /> that contains the endpoints for the registration entry in the lookup table that matches the information supplied in the <paramref name="resolveInfo" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveResponseInfo" />，其中包含查閱資料表中註冊項目的端點，這個資料表會比對 <paramref name="resolveInfo" /> 參數中所提供的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method looks up a registration entry based on the data supplied in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo> object and returns any corresponding endpoint addresses found in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會根據 <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo> 物件中提供的資料查詢註冊項目，並傳回任何在對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中找到的對應端點位址。

trans-unit.source: The number of endpoint addresses returned is equal to or less than the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo.MaxAddresses%2A> property set on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的端點位址數目會等於或小於 <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo.MaxAddresses%2A> 物件上設定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo" /> object is null or is not correctly formed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo" /> 物件為 null 或格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同 GUID 的註冊項目已經存在查閱資料表中，或是自訂對等解析程式服務尚未透過前一次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" /> 來啟動。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UnregisterInfo" /> that contains the information used to uniquely identify the registration entry to remove from the registration lookup table.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UnregisterInfo" />，其中包含可唯一識別要從註冊查閱資料表移除之註冊項目的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Removes a specific entry from the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 從對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表移除特定項目。

trans-unit.source: An entry for the specified registration entry could not be found, or the supplied <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UnregisterInfo" /> object is null or not correctly formed.
trans-unit.target: 找不到特定註冊項目的任何項目，或是提供的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UnregisterInfo" /> 物件為 null 或格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同 GUID 的註冊項目已經存在查閱資料表中，或是自訂對等解析程式服務尚未透過前一次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" /> 來啟動。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo" /> that uniquely identifies a specific registration entry and provides updated information for it.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo" />，可唯一識別特定註冊項目並提供其更新資訊。

trans-unit.source: Updates an existing registration entry entry in the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.
trans-unit.target: 更新對等解析程式服務之註冊查閱資料表中現有的註冊項目。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo" /> that contains a copy of the updated registration entry entry.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo" />，其中包含更新註冊項目的複本。

trans-unit.source: An entry for the specified registration entry could not be found, or the supplied <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo" /> object was not correctly formed.
trans-unit.target: 找不到特定註冊項目的任何項目，或是提供的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.UpdateInfo" /> 物件格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同 GUID 的註冊項目已經存在查閱資料表中，或是自訂對等解析程式服務尚未透過前一次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Open" /> 來啟動。
